action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid. The first column has empty squares except the bottom position. The bottom row is all empty squares. The remaining 4x4 area in the top-right is filled with X's.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X X X X ▢
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid with a triangular pattern. The bottom row has all X's. Each row above has one fewer X, creating a diagonal line. X's fill the lower left portion of the grid, while empty squares (□) fill the upper right.

This is my DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid. The first column has empty squares except the bottom position. The bottom row is all empty squares. The remaining 4x4 area in the top-right is filled with X's.
